sentences.en: Gorgon is one of the most ambitious of about 10 LNG projects being developed in Australia.
sentences.cn: 高更是澳大利亚10来个正在开发的液化天然气项目中,最雄心勃勃的项目之一.

sentences.en: Greek mythology a woman transformed into a Gorgon by Athena ; she was slain by Perseus.
sentences.cn: 希腊神话)让雅典娜变为蛇发女怪的女子,后为珀尔修斯所杀.

sentences.en: I asked him what it was and he told me that it was Medusa, the Gorgon.
sentences.cn: 我问他那是什么,他告诉我那是蛇发女怪美杜莎.

sentences.en: I asked him what it was and he told me that it was Meduse, Gorgon.
sentences.cn: 我问他那是什么?他告诉我那是蛇发女怪美杜莎.

sentences.en: Perseus , favored by Minerva and Mercury, set out against the Gorgon.
sentences.cn: 珀尔修斯在密涅瓦和墨丘利的庇护下出发去征服这蛇发女妖.

sentences.en: She would like to use Gorgon fruit as she makes soups.
The Gorgon project is one of the world's largest proposed gas developments.
sentences.cn: 高更项目是全球拟议中的最大天然气开发项目之一.

sentences.en: The Gorgon, Miss Springer, the games mistress came back to gave me a raspberry.
sentences.cn: 那个女妖魔, 即体育教师斯普林杰小姐又回来把我教训一通.

sentences.en: The soup becomes thick and sticky when mixed with powder of Gorgon Euryale seeds.
sentences.cn: 做汤时放些芡粉会使汤变得粘稠.

sentences.en: They would not be devoured by this gorgon of the East.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿被这个东部的妖怪吃掉.

sentences.en: This is August. Gorgon was born in August.
sentences.cn: 此刻是八月份儿. 葛根出生在八月份儿.

sentences.en: We believe God and so the curse of the Gorgon has no power with us.
sentences.cn: 我们相信上帝,因此蛇妖的诅咒对我们无能为力.

sentences.en: We instinctively look away from the Gorgon and toward the Scriptures for our understanding.
sentences.cn: 我们本能地将目光从蛇妖身上转移出去,投向圣经以求甚解.

words.tran_cn: 蛇发女怪（希腊神话中的一个形象）；丑陋女人

trans.tran_cn: （希腊神话中）三个蛇发女怪之一（能让人化为石头），可怕的女人，令人生厌的女人
